Package group10.client.model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
group10.client.model.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Card extends Object implements Serializable
Card class that represents a card object.
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay
See Also:
